title: Ep134: The End of a Hot Girl Summer
itunes:title: Ep134: The End of a Hot Girl Summer
description:
Weezy and Mandii are in the studio this week recapping their Hot Girl Summers as we slide into F-ck Boy Fall! Weezy begins with a rant after receiving a back handed compliment from a fan. Mandii, eager to stick to the outline starts off with Vanilla Shit from HuffPost.com to discuss the Karezza sex technique and some how spills the beans on recording her latest pegging venture. This week's KOTW involves objects and during the WD Weezy brings up all her new lovers and how she has been a hot girl in full effect. Don't forget to share your thoughts on this week's episode on Twitter using the hashtag #Whoreibledecisions or following and tagging @whoreible pod Follow the hosts on Instagram/Twitter Mandii @Fullcourtpumps & Weezy @weezywtf PHILLY! DC! BOSTON! The time is now to get your tickets for the Whoreible Decisions North America Tour at whoreibledecisions.com Pre-sale tickets along with 50+ bonus episodes are available at Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions or whoreibledecisions.com! Subscribe now and become a Patron!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
